185944835.review: CIv is the gold standard for the turn-based 4x genre and every game produced under this genre will inevitably be compared with Civ. The graphics are good and the gameplay is smooth, but the biggest deal breaker is the UI. Cluttered, unorganized and definitely not new player friendly. Most of the time, you will be struggling to find where things are and how things work. Very steep learning curve with a hilariously bad tutorial.

До сих пор актуальная, уже классика.

185223218.review: What would have been a great game, "Endless Legend" instead fails miserably due to it's lack of heroes and it's ridiculous duplicates of them.  The heroes are an important part of the game YET the developers chose not to invest in creating more unique ones and even worse, to allow duplicates to occur - meaning that another faction could be running around the map with an exact duplicate of one of your own heroes.  Each faction on average has just 3 portraits for their heroes BUT that's where the uniqueness ends.  After that, the developers just went ahead and gave 2 differing names and back stories for each portrait and then... wait for it... simply just add a "II" (the second) and a "III" (the third) to each of the names.  So that's 6 heroes all with the same portrait!  And to add to this, the game further allows duplicates of these heroes to be recruited by any faction through the marketplace!  So there you are with your prized hero, winning battles and leveling up to become your Empire's favorite champion when long behold, you find your enemy with an army that's being led with the exact same hero.  (Oh and in case you are wondering, there's no cloning chamber on the map, so there goes that explanation.  Nope, the reason is just simple laziness and cheapness on the game makers!)  Why this review, because it really is a neat game with it's differing factions, back stories and quests, the layout of the map, the ability to design your units, and lastly, the battling which takes place on a separate tactical map and plays like "chess on steroids" BUT unfortunately the lack of unique heroes ruins it all!

184370456.review:
不玩文明都不知道这游戏好在哪里。战斗、建设、派系、任务、剧情、科技全面拉踩文明。
战斗是复杂地形上的共同回合制，把地利和预判发挥到极致，是技术性最强变化最多的系统。而文明没有战斗。
建设非常轻简，有特异点作为指引，数值明确，只需点建筑分配劳力。而文明要微操农民，相邻加成一团乱麻。
派系设计差异化明显，玩法完全不同，基本没有开局定式。而文明派系核心特性的设计大多只需策划改个数值。
任务增强探图的正反馈和内置目标，许多任务恰好是玩家的策略本意，双倍快乐体验极好。而文明只有尤里卡。
剧情是每个派系专属的故事和胜利方式，用专属任务线贯穿，与华美的美术和音乐一起享用。而文明没有剧情。
科技取消前置限制，剧情任务的科技设计与派系非常契合。而文明各国共用科技树，还都需要严格的前置科技。
当然也有很多不足，例如比之全战战锤兵种较少，科技树差异较小。剧情任务也很难逃脱4X的行为范畴。但在4X里相对上手简单正反馈频繁，有官中和中配，各个DLC都很有新意，值得入手。

184169829.review: I keep coming back to this game, it just has a very interesting art style which blends beautifully with the gameplay.  If you like Age of Wonders 4, Civ 6, and really any of the 4x games, this one scratches a unique itch.  I honestly wish they'd make a sequel.

184094100.review: 《ENDLESS™ Legend》作为一款深度和策略性十足的回合制策略游戏，以其多样的文明、深度的策略和奇幻世界背景在多年前就备受关注。游戏提供了丰富的种族选择、充满战略性的建设经营和中规中矩的战斗系统，给予玩家充分的探索和发展空间。虽然游戏可能对新手玩家有一定的学习曲线，但对于热爱策略游戏和奇幻世界的玩家来说，这将是一场引人入胜的探索与征服之旅。（如若当年早早推出中文，相信也将是大放异彩的一款经典了！）

183791404.review:
Endless Legend is a game that is near and dear to me for too many reasons to list. That said, I will try my best to go over a small fraction of what makes this a wonderful game and why you might want to join incredible community attached to it.

Firstly, what makes it stand out from other 4x titles.
-Custom Factions: You can use one faction as a template, and use them to create a custom faction that plays completely different compared to the original. This has lead to a thriving optimization community for both single, and multiplayer (provided custom factions are on)
-The World Dynamics: The game uses a "quest" system wherein you can discover or be given quests that let you win the loyalty of other "minor" factions, give you distinct weapons and armor, unique technologies, and much more. I've not seen this done in exhaustive detail elsewhere outside Amplitude games.
Community support: The devs have their own discord where players can discuss things with one another and organize multiplayer games (which only require the host to have the DLC in order for all players to be able to use it). While the community is small, they are accepting and encouraging of new players.

I have more I could say, but this is a recommendation, not a dissertation. If you enjoy 4x games, looking to get into the genre, or just want a game to sink your teeth into I highly reccommend giving Endless Legend a try.

TLDR: EL's customization, dynamic game elements, and community make this a good game for 4x fans new and old to check out.
